title: "Appearance and accessibility" settings blank, can't disable automatic translation
body:
Hi there, thanks very much for this packaging of Teams for Linux, the switch to Teams v2 has been working very well for me.

I just have a small but annoying issue: I accidentally activated the automatic message translation feature and now I can't disable it. The context menu on the translated text has a "Settings..." option that I assume would let me disable it, but it takes me to an "Appearance and accessibility" section of the settings that doesn't load:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/23a67d31-2e53-40ae-aaee-611391103e89)



### Desktop
 - **OS:** Debian Stable (12)
 - **Teams version:** `1415/24071128825`
 - **teams-for-linux:** Installed from Flathub `com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux    1.9.0`
